signals.problem_statement: The customer is experiencing issues with managing communication effectively due to the increasing number of team members involved.
signals.customer_ask: Understanding what avenues we can go in from.
signals.suggested_solution: Integration with text platforms like Apple.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is concerned about missed communications and dropped tasks as their team grows.
signals.customer_ask: Looking for solutions to prevent things from getting dropped and missed.
signals.suggested_solution: Automation features to streamline communication management.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is looking for better integration options with their existing tools, specifically Microsoft and Apple.
signals.customer_ask: Inquiring about integration with Apple accounts.
signals.suggested_solution: Expand integration capabilities to include more platforms.
